General.Name: Guillemot Corporation S.A
General.Description: Guillemot Corporation S.A. designs, manufactures, and sells interactive entertainment hardware and accessories in France, Germany, the United Kingdom, Spain, the United States, Canada, Italy, China, Belgium, and Romania. It offers digital hardware and peripherals under the Hercules brand name; PC and console gaming accessories under the Thrustmaster brand name; and DJ solutions for various connected devices under the DJUCED brand name. Guillemot Corporation S.A. was founded in 1984 and is based in Chantepie, France.
